body: @mtrichards is this just windows? it seems to be showing for you in #2013
it may be, that's why i wanted you and @deepdiver1975 on the list, not sure where the problem lies.

just tested on a completely new install.  everything is owncloud 5.0.0rc1 fresh and new.

completely reinstalled a new owncloud server from scratch
windows 2008r2, iis, ms sql server 2008 r2

log in and enable the external storage app
select google drive and configure it
get a green stopsign, so it should work
click on files, no google drive folder shows up

same problem whether in the personal or admin tabs with google drive. 

server log:

are you seeing this on linux as well? i'm having no problems getting external storage to show mount points.
where do i get a google drive account? i a plain google account enough? thx

> where do i get a google drive account? i a plain google account enough? thx

yep - just visit http://drive.google.com with it.

i just hooked up oc5 on iis+sql server on win7 - works.
but i cannot navigate into a subfolder which has been created on google drive.
the returned xml is not loaded to the domdocument in line 147 files_external/lib/google.php

on oc 5 realease the whole external storage app seems broken.
if you fill out the information fields, the gui does not show any sign of activity. if you got to files, you do not see any folders. if you go back to settings, the previously filled in info is gone completely.
